original_text: So, at that time, we took power over all the land that the two Amorite kings, Og and Bashan, had ruled. Their land was east of the Jordan River, from the Arnon valley to Mount Hermon.
korean_text: 그 때에 우리가 요단 강 이쪽 땅을 아르논 골짜기에서부터 헤르몬 산에까지 아모리 족속의 두 왕에게서 빼앗았으니

sentences.original_text: So, at that time, we took power over all the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 때 우리는 모든 땅을 장악했습니다

sentences.original_text: that the two Amorite kings, Og and Bashan, had ruled.
sentences.korean_translation: 두 아모리 왕인 옥과 바산이 다스리던 땅을

sentences.original_text: Their land was east of the Jordan River,
from the Arnon valley to Mount Hermon.
